end

  // clock monitors

  generate
    for (n = 0; n < NUM_OF_CLOCKS; n = n + 1) begin: clk_mon
      up_clock_mon #(
        .TOTAL_WIDTH(21)
      ) i_clock_mon (
        .up_rstn(~up_reset_core),
        .up_clk(up_clk),
        .up_d_count(clk_mon_count[n]),
        .d_rst(1'b0),
        .d_clk(clock[n])
      );
    end
    for (n = NUM_OF_CLOCKS; n < 16; n = n + 1) begin: clk_mon_z
      assign clk_mon_count[n] = 21'd0;
    end
  endgenerate
